verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. When Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> brought back <S%H7725><s%> those that returned <S%H7725><s%> to Zion <S%H6726><s%>, We were like unto them that dream <S%H2492><s%>.

Then was our mouth <S%H6310><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> with laughter <S%H7814><s%>, And our tongue <S%H3956><s%> with singing <S%H7440><s%>: Then said <S%H559><s%> they among the nations <S%H1471><s%>, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> great things for them <S%H1431><s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath done <S%H6213><s%> great things <S%H1431><s%> for us <S%H8056><s%>, Whereof we are glad.
Turn again <S%H7725><s%> our captivity <S%H7622><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, As the streams <S%H650><s%> in the South <S%H5045><s%>.
They that sow <S%H2232><s%> in tears <S%H1832><s%> shall reap <S%H7114><s%> in joy <S%H7440><s%>.

He that goeth <S%H3212><s%> forth <S%H1980><s%> and weepeth <S%H1058><s%>, bearing <S%H5375><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> for sowing <S%H4901><s%>, Shall doubtless <S%H935><s%> come <S%H935><s%> again with joy <S%H7440><s%>, bringing <S%H5375><s%> his sheaves with him <S%H485><s%>.
